Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires entities that access a consumer's consumer credit report to notify such consumer of their right to obtain a security freeze
Summary: Requires entities that access a consumer's consumer credit report to notify such consumer of their right to obtain a security freeze, in addition to other information necessary to place, temporarily lift or permanently lift such security freeze; prohibits notices to consumers of their right to obtain a security freeze from containing advertising for paid services.
LawCode: Amd ยง380-t, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring entities that access a consumer's consumer credit report to notify such consumer of their right to obtain a security freeze
